```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(leaflegend)
library(sf)
library(osmdata)
```

```{r}
cantons_point <-  st_transform(st_read("../processed_data/point_data/cantons_point.shp"), crs=4326)
#https://rstudio.github.io/leaflet/markers.html
arrowIcon <- icons(
  iconUrl = ifelse(cantons_point$pol_or < 0,
                   "../icons/political_orientation/right.svg",
                   "../icons/political_orientation/arrow.png"),
  iconWidth=30, iconHeight = 35,
  iconAnchorY = 11, iconAnchorX = -1
)

leaflet(cantons_point) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(icon = arrowIcon) %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(icon = arrowIcon)
```
